frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-adjust-display-brightness
frozen.shortDescription: Simple GNOME extension to control displays' brightness via DDC. It requires ddcutil to be installed, I2C permissions for non-root users configured.
frozen.longDescription: Simple GNOME extension to control displays' brightness via DDC. It requires ddcutil to be installed, I2C permissions for non-root users configured.
